description.content: Add +1 DICE to the ranged characteristic of the model. All legionnares in a warband must upgrade the same characteristic.
Add +1 DICE to the melee characteristic of the model. All legionnares in a warband must upgrade the same characteristic.
Add +1 DICE to the melee characteristic of the model.

Each prisoner is strapped with an explosive which can be triggered one time at any point during their Activation. This counts as a ranged attack against every model (friend or foe) within 3” of the Prisoner. Everyone, including the Prisoner, is automatically hit and rolls on the Injury Chart to see what happens. Any model within 1” rolls +1 DICE on the Injury chart. Other models within 3” roll 2D6 as normal. The Prisoner rolls 4D6 and adds the results together to determine their Injury roll! If the explosive goes off and the Prisoner survives the battle, you can buy them a new Martyrdom Device for 35 ducats as normal, or field them without an Explosive.
Add +1 DICE to the melee characteristic of the model. When hit, any attacks against a Martyr-Penitent add -1 DICE when rolling on the Injury Table

Unless engaged in melee, before an enemy makes a charge against a SKIRMISHER, you can immediately move D3” in any direction you wish (except within 1” of any enemy). After this manoeuvre, the charging model is moved as normal. This may lead to the charger being unable to enter Melee.
Replace your existing armour with Heavy Armour, which provides a -3 to injury rolls. While wearing this armour the wearer cannot take any DASH ACTIONS.

The model gains the INFILTRATOR keyword. A maximum of two Yeomen can be upgraded into Trench Moles. An infiltrator can be deployed anywhere on the table that is not in line of sight of any enemy model and is at least 8” away from the nearest enemy model. Deployed after all other models without the Keyword INFILTRATOR.

The model gains the INFILTRATOR keyword. A maximum of three models can be upgraded into Trench Moles. An infiltrator can be deployed anywhere on the table that is not in line of sight of any enemy model and is at least 8” away from the nearest enemy model. Deployed after all other models without the Keyword INFILTRATOR.

An INFILTRATOR with this ability can be deployed anywhere on the battlefield including the enemy deployment Zone as long as the model is at least 8” away from any enemy models. The model does not have to be out of Line of Sight. Binoculars or Guard Dogs have no effect on this ability.

At the start of the battle, right before the first model is set up, declare whether or not this model will be set up by using Secret Paths. A model using the Secret Paths is not set up on the battlefield at the start of the battle and it may not be activated normally during the first turn. Starting in the second turn, you may activate these models. When you do, set up the model on the battlefield within contact with an edge of the battlefield and more than 8" away from all enemy models at the start of its activation. If both players have such models, the starting player declares whether one of their models is deployed or not first, followed by the other player. Alternate as normal until all such models have been declared as using Secret Paths or not.
The model has +2” movement and +1 DICE on its Dash ACTIONs.
Both Ranged and Melee attacks against the Assassin suffer -1 DICE penalty when determining if they hit.
This model is immune to the effects of FEAR.
This model gains the keywords SKIRMISHER and INFILTRATOR.
This model is immune to FEAR and disregards any BLOOD MARKERS from any source. Berserkers never wear armour, though they can carry a Trench Shield.
The model gains the INFILTRATOR keyword. Up to two shocktroopers can have this upgrade.
The model adds +1 DICE to any of their DASH ACTIONs.
The Homunculi can Fly as explained in the rules and gains a movement speed of 8”.
The Homunculus has an astonishing healing factor, and can remove 1 BLOOD MARKER every time it is Activated if it has any.
The Homunculi does not suffer additional BLOOD MARKERs with any damage with keyword GAS or FIRE
The Homunculus’ size is increased into vast proportions. It now has a base size of 50mm and it gains the Keyword TOUGH. This formula cannot be combined with the Alchemical Formula Wings.
The Homunculi gains the Keyword FIRETEAM along with 1 model of your choice in the Warband.

The Homunculi can buy and wield any weapon allowed in the Iron Sultanate warband list for any non-ELITE warrior or limited to a specific Troop type. They can also carry a Trench Shield. This Formula cannot be combined with the Alchemical Formula Wings. This will apply to human hands Alchemic Formula as well.

The musculature of the Homunculus is reinforced, replaced and strengthened. It now has a base size of 32mm (or 50mm if it also has Massive size). The Homunculus gains +1 DICE to its Melee characteristic and the Keyword STRONG
Be it through alluringly beauty or horrifying visage of terror, this Homunculus gains the Keyword FEAR.

The Homunculi can perform an additional attack ACTION in Melee or Ranged combat without any penalty. It has 3 hands to carry weapons if combined with Human Hands. In this case the Homunculi can make up to 2 Ranged Attack ACTIONs (if it has sufficient weapons and number of hands to carry them), and up 3 Melee Attack ACTIONs (if armed with 3 1-handed weapons), or 1 Melee Attack ACTION with 2-handed weapon and 1 Melee Attack ACTION with 1-handed weapon.
This Homunculi has two heads, and therefore can have two sets of eyes via Alchemical Formula.
Enemies suffer -1 DICE to their Melee attacks. Does not affect enemies with the keyword BLACK GRAIL or isn’t a Sniper Priest.
The eyesight of the Homunculus is based that of a predatory Bird. It can add +1 DICE to its Ranged Attack characteristic.
Homunculus adds +1 DICE to its Dash ACTIONs.
This Formula greatly enhances the intelligence of the Homunculus. It can now buy and use Equipment from the Sultanate Warband Equipment list as long as it is not limited to ELITE models.
Can only be bought if the Homunculus already has Human Hands, Inhuman Strength and Massive Size Formulas. The Homunculus now has a Base Size of 60mm and it can now use 1 Brazen Bull Only weapon.

This Alchemist is a student of Ibn Sina’s School of Medicine. The model is equipped with tools for healing from the House of Wisdom. The Alchemist can take an ACTION with +1 DICE to remove up to 2 BLOOD MARKERs or a single INFECTION MARKER from any one friendly model (including themselves) within 1” range or allow one friendly model (including themselves) who is Down to regain their footing.

The Alchemist has studied long and hard the sciences of cartography and Geometry. In the beginning of each battle up to 2 models (besides any Alchemists) In the Warband gain the Keyword INFILTRATOR as long as they are on 32mm or a smaller base. In addition, the Warband may re-roll one Exploration dice in the Exploration phase if you wish. The second result stands.

The Alchemist has bound their Takwin creature to themselves with unbreakable bonds. If the Alchemist is hit while within 1” of their own Homunculi, you can choose to redirect the hit against the Homunculi instead. Determine the injuries exactly as if the weapon just hit the Homunculi

Before the battle starts but after all models (including INFILTRATORs) are deployed, you may place a rectangular elemental obstacle 2” wide and 6” long. It counts both as Difficult Terrain and Dangerous Terrain, and damage it causes has the Keyword FIRE, GAS or SHRAPNEL (chosen by the player at the start of the Battle). It cannot be placed within 6” of any model or on top of any other terrain.

The Alchemist is well-versed in the hidden truths of the universe and of the Divine and has a calm and clear mind. The Warband gains +1 DICE to all Morale Rolls, cannot become Shaken, and the Alchemist is immune to the effects of the Keyword FEAR.
Gain the keyword STRONG.
One pilgrim may take this upgrade to gain the keyword STRONG.

This model is immune to FEAR and disregards any BLOOD MARKERS from any source. This model may never wear armour, though they can carry a Trench Shield or Holy Icon Shield. This model may not carry any Ranged Weapons.
This model causes INFECTION MARKERS with their unarmed attacks instead of BLOOD MARKERS.
Every ACTION taken by a model without Keyword BLACK GRAIL within 8” of a Herald is considered a RISKY ACTION. Does not affect non-ACTION rolls such as Charge Distance rolls.

Using this GOETIC (1-3) spell the Sorcerer opens a portal to the Lake of Fire, and draws forth a great screaming ball of fire. Select a 1x1mm point within 36” the Sorcerer can see. Next, take a Ranged Attack ACTION. If the roll fails (ie. you roll 6 or less), the bomb lands 1” away from its intended location, multiplied by the number representing the degree of failure (for example, if you rolled 5, the bombard shot lands 2” away, as 7-5=2). The direction is decided by your opponent. For each Blood Marker used, the Burning Inferno adds +1” BLAST to the attack. Additionally, if the Burning Inferno lands directly on top of a model, it ignores that model’s armour. This attack has the Keyword FIRE.
Any Warband
This model’s Charge move is always the maximum of 12”, though it still suffers penalties for Difficult Terrain as standard.
An inferior copy of the mark that God-Tyrant YHWH placed on the forehead of Cain, the First Murderer.
All Injury Rolls against this model suffer -1 DICE penalty.
This model adds +1 DICE to its Dash ACTIONs.

This Model can be equipped with one Weapon or suit of armour from Trench Pilgrim, New Antioch of Sultanate Warband Armouries. You must pay the cost of this item as standard, and if it is lost, it must be purchased again as soon as you have the funds. The model will never willingly trade this item away.
Using this GOETIC (2) spell allows the model using this spell to change positions with any model it sees within 12”. This cannot be done if either model engaged is in Melee combat.
One model in the Warband without the Keyword DEMONIC starts the game with 3 BLOOD MARKERs.
Using this GOETIC (1-3) spell allows you to give any one enemy model +1 BLOOD MARKER (up to a maximum of 3) for each BLOOD MARKER used to power this spell.

Using this GOETIC (2) spell ends the activation of the model using it. The model the enemy activates next this Turn must take its Move action as its first action, and move as directly towards the user of this power as it can through any passable terrain, including dangerous terrain, jumping down etc. taking damage on the way. It can then move and act normally with rest of its Actions, but cannot target the user of this spell during this activation with any Action.
The Warband with this model never has to make Morale tests as long as this model is part of the Warband.

Using this GOETIC (1) spell allows the model to negate a Down state or ignore any Injury, attack or power that would have caused the model to fall Down. This must be done immediately after when the Down result is sustained by the model with this Spell.

Using this GOETIC (2) Spell hits any enemy the model sees within 24”. The target must immediately roll on the Injury Chart. If this does not take it Out of Action, the target is pushed back by 1D6” directly away from the user of this power if it is on a 32mm or smaller base. If they hit another model or a solid object, they stop.
